props.title: Title
props.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

link_target.text: Open the link in a new window

link_toggle.text: Interactive toggle (also used for sublayouts modal connect)

link_modal_id.label: Modal ID
link_modal_id.description: Map the Article ID when using dynamic content. Then enable checkbox below to reveal modal links for the current item.
link_modal_id.show: ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['show_sublayout'] && link_toggle) || (this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['show_fieldsets'] && (link_1_toggle || link_2_toggle || link_3_toggle || link_4_toggle || link_5_toggle || link_6_toggle || link_7_toggle || link_8_toggle || link_9_toggle || link_10_toggle || link_11_toggle || link_12_toggle || link_13_toggle || link_14_toggle || link_15_toggle || link_16_toggle || link_17_toggle || link_18_toggle || link_19_toggle || link_20_toggle))) && ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_mode'] == 'modal' && ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_modal_group'] == 'all' && !link_toggle_modal_integration) || this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_modal_group'] != 'all')) || this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_mode'] == 'mixed')

link_modal_id_helper.text: Reveal modal IDs list for current item
link_modal_id_helper.show: ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['show_sublayout'] && link_toggle) || (this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['show_fieldsets'] && (link_1_toggle || link_2_toggle || link_3_toggle || link_4_toggle || link_5_toggle || link_6_toggle || link_7_toggle || link_8_toggle || link_9_toggle || link_10_toggle || link_11_toggle || link_12_toggle || link_13_toggle || link_14_toggle || link_15_toggle || link_16_toggle || link_17_toggle || link_18_toggle || link_19_toggle || link_20_toggle))) && ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_mode'] == 'modal' && ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_modal_group'] == 'all' && !link_toggle_modal_integration) || this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_modal_group'] != 'all')) || this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_mode'] == 'mixed')

link_modal_header_text.label: Modal Header Text
link_modal_header_text.description: Enter the desired text to display in the modal header.
link_modal_header_text.show: ((this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['show_sublayout'] && link_toggle) || (this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['show_fieldsets'] && (link_1_toggle || link_2_toggle || link_3_toggle || link_4_toggle || link_5_toggle || link_6_toggle || link_7_toggle || link_8_toggle || link_9_toggle || link_10_toggle || link_11_toggle || link_12_toggle || link_13_toggle || link_14_toggle || link_15_toggle || link_16_toggle || link_17_toggle || link_18_toggle || link_19_toggle || link_20_toggle))) && (this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_mode'] == 'modal' && this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_modal_group'] == 'all' && this.builder.parent(this.node)['props']['sublayout_modal_header'])

label.label: Navigation Label
label.description: Title or label field is required.

thumbnail.label: Navigation Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: This is only used, if the thumbnail navigation is set.

thumbnail_hover.label: Navigation Thumbnail Hover
thumbnail_hover.description: This is only used, if the thumbnail navigation is set.

thumbnail_icon.label: Navigation Icon
thumbnail_icon.description: Instead of using a navigation thumbnail image, you can click on the pencil to pick an icon from the icon library.

image_alt.label: Alt
image_alt.description: Provides a text alternative for search engines and accessibility tools.

image_title.label: Title
image_title.description: The title attribute provides additional information about the image.

image_attributes.label: Attributes
image_attributes.description:
Use = to separate name and value, one per line.
Examples: itemprop=image, decoding=async, loading=lazy.

link_text.label: Text
link_text.description: Sets a custom link text for this item.

link_aria_label.label: ARIA Label
link_aria_label.description: Sets a custom aria-label for this item to improve accessibility.

link_title.label: Title
link_title.description: Sets a custom link title attribute for tooltip or accessibility support.

link_class.label: Class
link_class.description: Adds custom CSS classes to the link element.

link_attributes.label: Attributes
link_attributes.description:
Use = to separate name and value, one per line.
Examples: data-type=iframe, onclick=window.print();.
